title: Condition 2
fullText:
A protective device may be placed on the supply side of the reduced cross-sectional area or other change, provided that it possesses an operating characteristic such that it protects the circuit situated on the load side against short-circuit, in accordance with Clause 2.5.4.5.
NOTE: This may be verified by comparing the short-circuit current level just before the branch device with the performance characteristics of the preceding device.
